price: 20. Buunkii (Qiyaamana) waa la afuufi - kaasu waa Maalinkii laysu yaboohay.
arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡوَعِيدِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wanufikha fī al-ṣūri dhālika yawmu al-waʿīdi
